TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ReportErrorEventHandler(object sender, ReportErrorEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ReportErrorEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle a <see cref="E:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.ReportError"> event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
